verses.text: \w After|strong="H0310"\w* \w this|strong="H0428"\w*, \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* two eunuchs, \w the|strong="H0310"\w* butler \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w baker|strong="H0644"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w offended|strong="H2398"\w* \w their|strong="H0310"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6547"\w* Pharao being \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* (now \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w was|strong="H6547"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* butler, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w baker|strong="H0644"\w*)

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* soldiers, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w prisoner|strong="H0631"\w*,

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* keeper \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prison|strong="H4929"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w served|strong="H8334"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*. \w Some|strong="H3117"\w* little \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w passed|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* kept \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w custody|strong="H4929"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w dreamed|strong="H2492"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w same|strong="H0259"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6623"\w* agreeing \w to|strong="H0376"\w* themselves:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H3130"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* sad,

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* sadder \w today|strong="H3117"\w* than \w usual|strong="H3117"\w*?

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H4994"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w dreamed|strong="H2492"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w nobody|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w interpret|strong="H6622"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: Doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6623"\w* \w belong|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? \w Tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* what \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w dreamed|strong="H2492"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* butler \w first|strong="H6440"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*: \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H6440"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*,

\w On|strong="H5927"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H7969"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w branches|strong="H8299"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H5927"\w* little \w and|strong="H1612"\w* little \w sent|strong="H5927"\w* out buds, \w and|strong="H1612"\w* after \w the|strong="H5927"\w* blossoms \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* forth \w ripe|strong="H1310"\w* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Pharao \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* pressed \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* which \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w held|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Pharao.

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6623"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* dream: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w branches|strong="H8299"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w yet|strong="H3117"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

\w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* Pharao \w will|strong="H1961"\w* remember thy \w service|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* thee \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* thou shalt \w present|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thy office, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* thou wast wont \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Only|strong="H0518"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w*: \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w* Pharao \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w mind|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w stolen|strong="H1589"\w* \w away|strong="H1589"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H1571"\w* \w fault|strong="H3972"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* cast \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* dungeon.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w baker|strong="H0644"\w* \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* wisely \w interpreted|strong="H6622"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H0637"\w* dreamed \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w baskets|strong="H5536"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* meal \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* which \w was|strong="H6547"\w* uppermost, \w I|strong="H4480"\w* \w carried|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* meats \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H4639"\w* \w made|strong="H4639"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w art|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* baking, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w ate|strong="H0398"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6623"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* dream: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w baskets|strong="H5536"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w yet|strong="H3117"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*:

\w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H6086"\w* Pharao \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* thee \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* cross, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* tear thy \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w birthday|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Pharao: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* great \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* remembered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* butler, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w baker|strong="H0644"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* one \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w present|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* other \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* on \w a|strong="H0834"\w* gibbet, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* truth \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* interpreter \w might|strong="H0834"\w* be shewn.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* butler, \w when|strong="H2142"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* prospered \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w forgot|strong="H7911"\w* \w his|strong="H2142"\w* interpreter.
